Song.title: Give Me Self-Control
Song.copyright: Music by Doug Plank Words by Doug Plank & Bob Kauflin © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship/Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Your [Bb]Word tells me I have a need To watch out for my [F]soul And [Bb]every day it’s clear to me I [Bb]need Your [F]self-con[Bb]trol My [Bb]hands and feet are quick to move Before I even [F]know So [Bb]Jesus, make me more like You And [Bb]give me [F]self-con[Bb]trol
Chorus: [Eb]Lord, [Bb/D]I’m [Cm7]need[F]y, [Eb]so [Bb/D]I’m [Fsus]plead[Bb]ing [Eb]Come [Bb/D]and [Cm7]fill [F]me,{,} [Eb]help me [Bb/D]to be [F]self-con[Bb]trolled [Eb]Help me [Bb/D]to be [2/4] [F]self-[4/4]cont[Bb]rolled [| Eb Bb | Eb Bb/D | F Bb]
Verse 2: When [Bb]I say words I shouldn’t speak And hurt the ones I [F]know On [Bb]mornings when I’d rather sleep I [Bb]need Your [F]self-cont[Bb]rol When [Bb]I am told to sit for hours And time goes by so [F]slow I [Bb]need the Holy Spirit’s power To [Bb]give me [F]self-cont[Bb]rol
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 your word tells me i have a need to watch out for my soul and every day its clear to me i need your selfcontrol my hands and feet are quick to move before i even know so jesus make me more like you and give me selfcontrol chorus lord im needy so im pleading come and fill me help me to be selfcontrolled help me to be selfcontrolled verse 2 when i say words i shouldnt speak and hurt the ones i know on mornings when id rather sleep i need your selfcontrol when i am told to sit for hours and time goes by so slow i need the holy spirits power to give me selfcontrol
